content: प्रकांडः, --डं {@--1@} The trunk of a tree from the root to the branches; <ls>Śi. 9. 45.</ls> {@--2@} A branch, shoot. {@--3@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Anything excellent or pre-eminent of its kind; ऊरुप्रकांडद्वितयेन तस्याः <ls>N. 7. 93</ls>; क्षत्रप्रकांडः <ls>Mv. 4. 35</ls>; <ls n="Mv.">5. 48.</ls> --डः The upper part of the arm.
